operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO auth_updates_state (auth_key_id, user_id, pts, qts, seq, date2, created_at) VALUES (:auth_key_id, :user_id, :pts, :qts, :seq, :date2, :created_at)

operation.name: SelectById
operation.sql: SELECT auth_key_id, user_id, pts, qts, seq FROM auth_updates_state WHERE auth_key_id = :auth_key_id AND user_id = :user_id

operation.name: UpdatePts
operation.sql: UPDATE seq_updates_ngen SET pts = :pts WHERE auth_key_id = :auth_key_id AND user_id = :user_id
